column4: I'm trying totem-xine but most videos (including DivX, xVid) couldn't be played with it because of the lack of decoder. Can anyone tell me what package should I install, besides totem-xine to be able to play most media as totem-gstreamer does ?
Doesn't totem ask you to install the drivers it needs to play your media?
yup, I installed all of the necessary gstreamer packages.
